Tired of a life of partying non stop, we decided to stop by this place for an afternoon lunch. Food was pretty decent and desert was yumi.  Although I found it a bit pricey, it was worth the trouble.The problem was the service. OMG. Slow as it could be.  Careless.  I became very frustrated after a while, and all I wanted to do was to leave! The place itself is gorgeous.  I ordered some wild salmon with quinoa salad, and it was delicious.  My friend had the ceviche, which was marvelous.
